channel.title: flower development on funPlantGenes
channel.description: Recent content in flower development on funPlantGenes

item.title: ACS1G
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: CsaV3_6G044410 Gene Symbol: ACS1G Gene Name: 1-aminocyclopropane-1-carboxylate synthase Genome: Species: Cucumis sativus Functional Descriptions: Gain-of-function of the 1-aminocyclopropane-1-carboxylate synthase gene ACS1G induces female flower development in cucumber gynoecy.

item.title: BcMF2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: BcMF2 Gene Name: Male Fertility 2 Genome: Species: Brassica campestris Functional Descriptions: The polygalacturonase gene BcMF2 from Brassica campestris is associated with intine development.

item.title: BdCCD4.2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: BdCCD4.2 Gene Name: carotenoid cleavage dioxygenase 4 Genome: Species: Buddleja davidii Functional Descriptions: Both BdCCD4 genes are highly expressed during flower development and transcripts levels parallel the accumulation of crocins in the petals.

item.title: BjHMGS1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: BjHMGS1 Gene Name: 3-hydroxy-3-methylglutaryl coenzyme A synthase Genome: Species: Brassica juncea Functional Descriptions: HMGS assays confirmed that Escherichia coli-expressed recombinant BjHMGS1 shows HMGS activity that is inhibited by F244, a specific inhibitor of HMGS.

item.title: BnaA4.BOR2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: BnaAnn31830D Gene Symbol: BnaA4.BOR2 Gene Name: B efflux transporter Genome: Brassica napus Genome Resources Species: Brassica napus Functional Descriptions: BnaA4.

item.title: BnaC03.FBA
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: BnaC03G0156800ZS Gene Symbol: BnaC03.FBA Gene Name: FBox-associated Genome: Species: Brassica napus Functional Descriptions: The BnaC03.

item.title: BnaSSA07.CRC
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: BnaA07G0307300ZS Gene Symbol: BnaSSA07.CRC Gene Name: CRABS CLAW Genome: Species: Brassica napus Functional Descriptions: BnaCRCs with domestication preference positively correlate with the seed-setting rate of canola.

item.title: BnaSSC06.CRC
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: BnaC06G0356800ZS Gene Symbol: BnaSSC06.CRC Gene Name: CRABS CLAW Genome: Species: Brassica napus Functional Descriptions: BnaCRCs with domestication preference positively correlate with the seed-setting rate of canola.

item.title: CaJOINTLESS
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CaJOINTLESS Gene Name: Cajointless Genome: Species: Capsicum annuum Functional Descriptions: CaJOINTLESS is a MADS-box gene involved in suppression of vegetative growth in all shoot meristems in pepper.

item.title: CFO1;OsMADS32
item.description: Gene Details: MSU gene ID: LOC_Os01g52680 RAPdb gene ID: Os01g0726400 Gene Symbol: CFO1 OsMADS32 Genome: MSU7 , IRGSP-1.

item.title: CmBES1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CmBES1 Gene Name: BRI1-EMS-SUPPRESSOR 1 Genome: Chrysanthemum genome v2.

item.title: CmLHP1A
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MELO3C006209 Gene Symbol: CmLHP1A Gene Name: LIKE HETEROCHROMATIN PROTEIN1 Genome: Species: Cucumis melo Functional Descriptions: CmLHP1 proteins play a key role in plant development and sex determination in melon.

item.title: CmLHP1B
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MELO3C022484 Gene Symbol: CmLHP1B Gene Name: LIKE HETEROCHROMATIN PROTEIN1 Genome: Species: Cucumis melo Functional Descriptions: CmLHP1 proteins play a key role in plant development and sex determination in melon.

item.title: CmNRRa
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CmNRRa Gene Name: Genome: Species: Chrysanthemum morifolium Functional Descriptions: CmNRRa, an orthologous gene of OsNRRa that regulates root growth in response to nutrient stress in rice, was identified from Chrysanthemum and its role in flowering time was studied.

item.title: CpACS27A
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CpACS27A Gene Name: Argo 1-aminocyclopropane-1-carboxylate synthase Genome: Species: Cucurbita pepo Functional Descriptions: Molecular and functional characterization of CpACS27A gene reveals its involvement in monoecy instability and other associated traits in squash.

item.title: CpMS1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CpMS1 Gene Name: MALE STERILITY 1 Genome: Species: Carica papaya Functional Descriptions: No amplification of the CpMS1 gene was detected in any of the female flower samples, supporting the RNA-Seq results and CpMS1 participation on male flower organ development.

item.title: CRC
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: CMiso1.1chr10g0266651 Gene Symbol: CRC Gene Name: CRABS CLAW Genome: Melon (Charmono) v1.

item.title: CsERF31
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Csa3G135120 Gene Symbol: CsERF31 Gene Name: ETHYLENE RESPONSE FACTOR31 Genome: Species: Cucumis sativus Functional Descriptions: A positive feedback loop mediated by CsERF31 initiates female cucumber flower development.

item.title: CsLFY
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Csa1G000050.1 Gene Symbol: CsLFY Gene Name: LEAFY Genome: Species: Cucumis sativus Functional Descriptions: CsLFY is required for shoot meristem maintenance via interaction with WUSCHEL in cucumber.

item.title: EP3;LP
item.description: Gene Details: MSU gene ID: LOC_Os02g15950 RAPdb gene ID: Os02g0260200 Gene Symbol: EP3 LP Genome: MSU7 , IRGSP-1.

item.title: FON2;FON4
item.description: Gene Details: MSU gene ID: LOC_Os11g38270 RAPdb gene ID: Os11g0595400 Gene Symbol: FON2 FON4 TG1 Genome: MSU7 , IRGSP-1.

item.title: FveYUC4
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: FvH4_2g29930 Gene Symbol: FveYUC4 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Fragaria vesca Functional Descriptions: Auxin biosynthesis gene FveYUC4 is critical for leaf and flower morphogenesis in woodland strawberry.

item.title: FvFT1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: FvH4_6g00090 Gene Symbol: FvFT1 Gene Name: FLOWERING LOCUS T1 Genome: Fragaria vesca Whole Genome v4.

item.title: FvTFL1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: FvH4_6g18480 Gene Symbol: FvTFL1 Gene Name: TERMINAL FLOWER 1 Genome: Fragaria vesca Whole Genome v4.

item.title: G1
item.description: Gene Details: MSU gene ID: LOC_Os07g04670 RAPdb gene ID: Os07g0139300 Gene Symbol: G1 Genome: MSU7 , IRGSP-1.

item.title: GbBM
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gbar_A07G008330 Gene Symbol: GbBM Gene Name: Beauty Mark Genome: Species: Gossypium barbadense Functional Descriptions: Demonstrate that GbBM directly targets the promoter of four flavonoid biosynthesis genes to positively regulate petal spot development.

item.title: GhACS2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhACS2 Gene Name: ACS-like protein Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: To elucidate the roles of genes during anther development, two anther-specific cDNAs (designated GhACS1 and GhACS2) encoding acyl-CoA synthetases (ACSs) were isolated from a cotton (Gossypium hirsutum) flower cDNA library.

item.title: GhMYB24
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhMYB24 Gene Name: R2R3-MYB-like protein 24 Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: A Cotton Gene Encoding MYB-Like Transcription Factor (GhMYB24) is Specifically Expressed in Pollen and is Involved in Regulation of Late Anther/Pollen Development.

item.title: GmNMH7
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GmNMH7 Gene Name: Nodule MADS-box Homologue 7 Genome: Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: In situ expression of the GmNMH7 gene is photoperiod-dependent in a unique soybean (Glycine max [L.

item.title: LhMYB12
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: LhMYB12 Gene Name: R2R3-MYB transcription factor 12 Genome: Species: Lilium hybrid Functional Descriptions: The novel allele of the LhMYB12 gene is involved in splatter-type spot formation on the flower tepals of Asiatic hybrid lilies.

item.title: LjCYC1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: LjCYC1 Gene Name: CYCLOIDEA1 Genome: Species: Lotus japonicus Functional Descriptions: LjCYC Genes Constitute Floral Dorsoventral Asymmetry in Lotus japonicus.

item.title: LjCYC2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: LjCYC2 Gene Name: CYCLOIDEA2 Genome: Species: Lotus japonicus Functional Descriptions: LjCYC Genes Constitute Floral Dorsoventral Asymmetry in Lotus japonicus.

item.title: LjCYC3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: LjCYC3 Gene Name: CYCLOIDEA3 Genome: Species: Lotus japonicus Functional Descriptions: LjCYC Genes Constitute Floral Dorsoventral Asymmetry in Lotus japonicus.

item.title: MdMYB3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MdMYB3 Gene Name: MYB domain class transcription factor3 Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: An apple MYB transcription factor, MdMYB3, is involved in regulation of anthocyanin biosynthesis and flower development.

item.title: MtNAM
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MtNAM Gene Name: NO APICAL MERISTEM Genome: Species: Medicago truncatula Functional Descriptions: NO APICAL MERISTEM (MtNAM) regulates floral organ identity and lateral organ separation in Medicago truncatula.

item.description: Gene Details: MSU gene ID: LOC_Os01g47050 RAPdb gene ID: Os01g0659900 Gene Symbol: OsFBK1 Genome: MSU7 , IRGSP-1.

item.description: Gene Details: MSU gene ID: LOC_Os03g11614 RAPdb gene ID: Os03g0215400 Gene Symbol: OsLG3b OsMADS1 LHS1 AFO Genome: MSU7 , IRGSP-1.

item.title: OSMADS3
item.description: Gene Details: MSU gene ID: LOC_Os01g10504 RAPdb gene ID: Os01g0201700 Gene Symbol: OSMADS3 Genome: MSU7 , IRGSP-1.

item.title: PpB3-1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Pp08G015510 Gene Symbol: PpB3-1 Gene Name: Genome: CN14 genome Species: Prunus persica Functional Description: PpB3-1, a candidate gene for flower type (SH) and flower size, contributed to petal development and promoted petal enlargement.

item.title: PpTIP2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Pp03G006310 Gene Symbol: PpTIP2 Gene Name: aquaporin tonoplast intrinsic protein 2 Genome: CN14 genome Species: Prunus persica Functional Descriptions: De novo chromosome-level genome of a semi-dwarf cultivar of Prunus persica identifies the aquaporin PpTIP2 as responsible for temperature-sensitive semi-dwarf trait and PpB3-1 for flower type and size.

item.title: Pvtb1a
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Pavir.Ia00838/Pavir.9NG142700 Gene Symbol: Pvtb1a Gene Name: Genome: Panicum virgatum v4.

item.title: Pvtb1b
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Pavir.Ib04362/Pavir.9KG031700 Gene Symbol: Pvtb1b Gene Name: Genome: Panicum virgatum v4.

item.title: pyp1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Solyc01g098110 Gene Symbol: pyp1 Gene Name: PALE YELLOW PETAL 1 Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: Identification of the carotenoid modifying gene PALE YELLOW PETAL 1 as an essential factor in xanthophyll esterification and yellow flower pigmentation in tomato.

item.title: si3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Zm00001eb086630 Gene Symbol: si3 Gene Name: Silky3 Genome: Zm-B73-REFERENCE-NAM-5.

item.title: Sl-AGL11
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Solyc11g028020 Gene Symbol: Sl-AGL11 Gene Name: agamous-like MADS-box protein AGL11 Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: Overexpression of the class D MADS-box gene Sl-AGL11 impacts fleshy tissue differentiation and structure in tomato fruits.

item.title: Sl-IAA27
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: Sl-IAA27 Gene Name: Aux/IAA transcription factor27 Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: Phenotypes Associated with Down-Regulation of Sl-IAA27 Support Functional Diversity Among Aux/IAA Family Members in Tomato.

item.title: SlBES1.8
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Solyc10g076390 Gene Symbol: SlBES1.8 Gene Name: Brassinazole-resistant 1 Genome: Tomato Genome version SL4.

item.title: SlDOF9
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Solyc02g090220 Gene Symbol: SlDOF9 Gene Name: DNA-binding with one zinc finger 9 Genome: Tomato Genome version SL4.

item.title: SlMPK4
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: SlMPK4 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: SlMPK4 is preferentially and highly expressed in tomato stamens and its mRNA levels increase during early flower development, peaking at the mature pollen stage.

item.title: StSP6A
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: PGSC0003DMT400060057 Gene Symbol: StSP6A Gene Name: SELF-PRUNING 6A Genome: Species: Solanum tuberosum Functional Descriptions: The tuberization signal StSP6A represses flower bud development in potato.
